mapper.select: SELECT a.AUTHOR_CODE , a.USR_ID , a.AUTHOR_GRP_CODE , a.ADD_DT , b.USR_NM FROM COMTNAUTHORUSR a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNUSERMNG b on (a.USR_ID = b.USR_ID) WHERE a.AUTHOR_CODE = '${AUTHCD}'
SELECT AUTHOR_CODE , USR_ID , AUTHOR_GRP_CODE , ADD_DT FROM COMTNAUTHORUSR WHERE USR_ID = '${USR_ID}'
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM COMTNAUTHORUSR WHERE AUTHOR_CODE = '${AUTHCD}' AND USR_ID = '${USR_ID}'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNAUTHORUSR ( AUTHOR_CODE , USR_ID , AUTHOR_GRP_CODE , ADD_DT ) SELECT AUTHOR_CODE , '${USR_ID}' , '' , '${DT}' FROM COMTNAUTHORINFO where AUTHOR_CODE = '${AUTHCD}'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM COMTNAUTHORUSR WHERE AUTHOR_CODE = '${AUTHCD}' AND USR_ID = '${USR_ID}'
